tool_description: Creates comprehensive backups of user data, system settings, installed programs list, and system configuration before OS recovery operations.

backup_location.description: Destination path for backup files (external drive recommended)

backup_type.description: Type of backup: user_data, system_image, selective, or complete

include_application_data.description: Whether to backup application data and settings

verify_backup.description: Whether to verify backup integrity after creation

error_messages: Invalid backup location: Ensure the destination path exists and has sufficient free space.
Unsupported backup type: Use one of [user_data, system_image, selective, complete].
Insufficient disk space: Backup requires more space than available at destination.
Access denied to source files: Run with administrator privileges to backup all system files.
Invalid compression level: Use integer value between 1 and 9.
Backup verification failed: Backup file integrity check detected errors.
usage: Specify backup_location on external drive and backup_type based on recovery needs. For complete OS reinstall, use 'complete' type. For repair scenarios, 'user_data' may suffice. Enable verify_backup for critical data.

backup_size_gb.description: Total size of created backup in gigabytes

files_backed_up.description: Number of files included in backup

backup_duration_minutes.description: Time taken to complete backup in minutes

backup_file_path.description: Full path to the created backup file
